content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

# Pig Latin Transformer
using Distributed

@everywhere function pig_latinify(word::AbstractString)
    tokens = split(word, "[aeiou]")
    if !isempty(tokens) && tokens[1] != ""
        tokens = vcat(tokens[2:end], tokens[1] * "ay")
    end
    return join(tokens, "")
end

@everywhere function transform(x)
    word = @spawnat localhost pig_latinify(x)
    return fetch(word)
end

transforms = pmap(transform, ["test", "phrase", "wow"])
println(transforms)
